title: Mac client issues
body:
Am I the only one have issues on the mac client.  I can not ping.  I am in full screen mode, hold down the alt key to ping attack or anything.  instead of bring up the that option instead if I move the mouse I move the entire screen.  Making the game unplayable as pings do not work. I can not ping attack target.  I can not easily ping anything useful.


This has never happen before and feels like it should be fix yesterday.

replies.body:
Does this also happen in Windowed mode or Borderless? If it does, then it's likely your input file may be corrupt in some sort of way. I'd like you to complete a reset of the input file with the following steps.

You'll want to log into the Client and leave it running in the background. Then complete the following:

>- Select your 'Applications' folder on your Dock
- Select 'Open in Finder'
- Right Click on 'League of Legends'
- Select 'Show Package Contents'
- Select 'Contents'
- Select 'LoL'
- Delete the folder named 'Config' (Right Click, then select 'Move to trash', then empty your trash)

Once you've deleted the folder, hop into a custom match to confirm the change went through and test your smartpings out. You may also want to hop into your **Hotkeys** settings and ensure your bindings have been configured the way you want them. Let me know if this worked!
